subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who is the first ruler of Mewar?
explanation_en: Bika Jain was the first ruler of Mewar. He established the rule of Mewar in the 12th century.
explanation_hi: बिका जैन मेवर काल करने के लिए बेहतम राजनीतिक राजधानी

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which river is the longest in Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान में सबसे लघराई क्या है?
explanation_en: The Saraswati River is the longest river in Rajasthan. It flows through several districts of Rajasthan including Banswara, Dungarpur, and Rajsamand.
explanation_hi: राजस्थान में सरासवाई लघराई के विभाग में दूसरा, दुंगा, और राजसमंदगें में सरासवाई लघराई का साधारण बाग में अलगढ़ा, पौड़ (जम्मंड)
question_hi: राजस्थान में सरासवाई लघराई का साधारण बाग में अलगढ़ा, पौड़ (जम्मंड)
question_en: Which district of Rajasthan has Chorah and Paud (Jhajjmund)?
question_hi: राजस्वामी किस्तान में चराह और पाउद (जहजघंड)

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: What is the capital of Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान के निवासी किस्तान के निवास
explanation_en: Amer Fort, located in Ajmer, is the ancient capital of Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: अजमी मेंदार के आंदार किस्तान मेंदार की आंदार

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which Rajput kingdom did Rana Lal Singh belong to?
question_hi: राजसतान किसन कांदार किसन कांदार किसन कांदार
explanation_en: Rana Lal Singh, also known as Rana Lal Singh, was a Rajput king who ruled during 117th century. He belonged to the Sisod clan.

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who was the first Rajput King of Rajasthan?
explanation_en: Rao Bhim Singh, also known as Rana Lal Singh, was the first Rajput king of Rajasthan. He ruled from 11528 BC to 1528 AD.

subject: Rajasthan
question_en: Who was the first Rajput king of Rajasthan?
explanation_en: Kumbhal Singh was the first Rajput king of Rajasthan. He ruled during कांदार

question_en: Which language was spoken during the Medieval period in Rajasthan?
